name: garden
about: You are standing in a sunny, Japanese garden

actions.relax: You lay down on the grass. Feels great!
actions.help: Nobody is around to help you.

name: tree
about: a very tall, lovely, Japanese plum blossom tree

actions.hug: You give the tree a long hug.

name: beach
about: You are on a beautiful, white beach

name: manual
about: It's a book on AI programming in Python, written by a bot

read: <on read 1>You already read it, and you're not going to read it again!
<on read 0><set read 1>As you read the Python manual your mind starts to drift. You see a vision of 100-foot robots fighting, smashing down buildings as they grapple. Your vision fades.

name: cave
about: You are in The Cave of Darkness. It's very dark in here! You hear a sound.

actions.listen: You hear a series of musical beeps, as if being played by an old IBM computer.

name: clue
about: It's a little clue written on a yellow post-it note

actions.read: <set tower.hasclue 1>It says: "You have a very big pocket."

name: tower
about: It's a big, white stone tower

enter: <on hasclue 0>You don't have a clue how to enter the tower.
